text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in https://connect.ichom.org/patient-centered-outcome-measures/stroke
    CodeDisplay
    1Yes, I lived alone
    2No, I shared my household with a spouse/partner or another person (e.g. sibling, children, parents)
    999Unknown

name: MolicAVC_LiveAlonePreStrokeValueSet
title: Live Alone Pre-Stroke ValueSet
description: ValueSet indicating whether a patient lived alone prior to a stroke event based on ICHOM terminology.

concept.display: No, I shared my household with a spouse/partner or another person (e.g. sibling, children, parents)
